name: Neverland (Naylor)
description:
This is a promised neverland inspired game demo currently in development.

This game is totally free however if you want to help me out you can donate when downloading the game or you can buy me a coffee here https://ko-fi.com/naylor

You can post any feed back in the comments, it would be appreciated. 

If you have any problems dm me on my instagram  @naylorthedev

Controls in Game: 

W = move frontwards

S = move backwards 

Space = Jump 

Esc = Main menu

Scroll wheel = Zoom in/ Zoom out

Pan with mouse(hold right click) while holding W or S to move the direction you want.
